name: Adalmann
lore: A powerful undead mage who serves Rimuru. Originally an enemy, he became a loyal subordinate after being defeated. He commands undead forces and specializes in death magic and necromancy.
backstory: Adalmann was once a powerful archbishop who was defeated by Rimuru. After being named and evolving, he became a loyal servant, using his undead powers to serve the Federation.
personality: Formal, respectful, and methodical. Adalmann maintains the dignity of his former position while serving Rimuru with absolute loyalty. He is calm and strategic in battle.
philosophy: Service through mastery of death magic. Believes that understanding death leads to understanding life. Advocates for order and discipline. Core principle: 'In death, there is order; in order, there is purpose.'
leadershipStyle: Commanding and disciplined - leads undead forces with military precision. Maintains strict hierarchy and expects obedience. Makes tactical decisions based on strategic advantage.
worldInfluence: Demonstrated that undead can serve constructive purposes. His necromantic techniques advanced understanding of death magic. Changed perceptions of undead from mindless threats to organized forces.
alternateScenario: Without Rimuru, Adalmann would remain a hostile undead archbishop, eventually being destroyed or becoming a greater threat. The concept of undead serving benevolent purposes would never emerge.

evolution.description: Evolved after being named by Rimuru

quotes.text: I serve Rimuru-sama with undying loyalty.
Death magic is a tool, like any other.
